GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with a given id

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/api/articles/:article_id/commen.description: serves an array of all comments with a given article id

POST /api/api/articles/:article_id/comme.description: posts a new comment and serves an object with the posted comment

PATCH /api/api/articles/:article_id/comm.description: updates article with given id based on vote increment, serves the updated article object
